function renderLine( line, pattern) for i=1, strlen(pattern) do local c = strsub( pattern, i, i) if c=="x" then oxyd(i-1,line) elseif c=="#" then set_stone("st-glass",i-1,line) set_floor("fl-sahara",i-1,line) elseif c=="a" then set_stone("st-glass1",i-1,line) set_floor("fl-sahara",i-1,line) elseif c=="b" then set_stone("st-glass2",i-1,line) set_floor("fl-sahara",i-1,line) elseif c=="c" then set_stone("st-glass3",i-1,line) set_floor("fl-sahara",i-1,line)
elseif c=="M" then set_stone("st-glass_move",i-1,line) set_floor("fl-sahara",i-1,line) elseif c=="1" then set_stone("st-glass1_move",i-1,line) set_floor("fl-sahara",i-1,line) elseif c=="2" then set_stone("st-glass2_move",i-1,line) set_floor("fl-sahara",i-1,line)
elseif c=="h" then set_stone("st-glass1_hole",i-1,line) set_floor("fl-sahara",i-1,line) elseif c=="H" then set_stone("st-glass2_hole",i-1,line) set_floor("fl-sahara",i-1,line)
elseif c=="B" then set_stone("st-beads",i-1,line) set_floor("fl-sahara",i-1,line)
elseif c=="w" then set_stone("st-window",i-1,line) set_floor("fl-sahara",i-1,line)
elseif c=="P" then set_stone("st-polarswitch",i-1,line, {on=TRUE}) set_floor("fl-sahara",i-1,line)
elseif c=="L" then set_stone("st-laser-e",i-1,line,{on=TRUE}) set_floor("fl-sahara",i-1,line) elseif c=="R" then set_stone("st-laser-w",i-1,line,{on=TRUE}) set_floor("fl-sahara",i-1,line)
elseif c=="C" then set_item("it-cherry",i-1,line) set_floor("fl-sahara",i-1,line)
elseif c=="U" then set_item("it-umbrella",i-1,line) set_floor("fl-sahara",i-1,line)
elseif c==" " then set_floor("fl-sahara",i-1,line) end end end
